user.bio: Yeni tatlar keşfetmek, farklı stiller denemek, bira kültürü hakkında öğrenmek ve paylaşmak için sabırsızlanıyorum.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 100 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 21!

items.checkin_comment: More an ale than a pilsener but okay

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 20 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 5!
They know what you want when you walk in the door. That’s right, you don’t have to wait for anyone here.
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 5!

After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 40 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.checkin_comment: Random pils, startup from Antalya. Manufacturers main focus is wine based aromatic drinks, I guess.

location.venue_address: Andifli Mahallesi Çukurbağlılar Caddesi No:8/1 Kaş

items.badge_description: We love lagers! Crisp, clean, cold fermenting, these beers are a labor of love. Whether a dark Dunkel, a malty amber, or a light helles, lagers never fail us. So on Lager Day, join us in a toast to the humble lager.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 20 check-ins with a photo.

items.checkin_comment: bitiriste aroma cok az kaliyor, malt profilli ama cok arkada kaiyor tat, serbetciocu aciligi neredeyse yok gibi. karbonizasyonu gereginden fazla yuksek. turkiye’deki en kotu lagerlerden biridir sanirim. ancak fiyati en uygun bira.
